text: Mark Twain Tonight is a one man play starring Hal Holbrook as Mark Twain. His first performance as Twain was in 1954 in a college in Pennsylvania. Holbrook won a Tony Award for his performance as Twain. During this play, Holbrook tells some of Twain's stories or give some jokes about Twain's life. Category:Mark Twain Category:American plays Category:1950s plays Category:1954 works
title: Mark Twain Tonight
